content:
RetryStrategy.DefaultProgressive Property

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.TransientFaultHandling
Assembly:
Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.TransientFaultHandling.dll

In this Article

Returns a default policy that implements a progressive retry interval configured with the DefaultClientRetryCount, DefaultRetryInterval, and DefaultRetryIncrement parameters. The default retry policy treats all caught exceptions as transient errors.

public static Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.TransientFaultHandling.RetryStrategy DefaultProgressive { get; }
Returns
RetryStrategy

To be added.
